comments.body: For this function, I can't find the document for this type. [Here ](https://datatables.net/reference/api/tables%28%29) is what I found, could you help clarify here? Thanks!

It's this function: [https://datatables.net/reference/api/%24.fn.dataTable.tables()](https://datatables.net/reference/api/%24.fn.dataTable.tables%28%29)

I included it in my change because it was part of the [1.10.8 release.](https://cdn.datatables.net/1.10.8/)
